name: ARSSS
description:
Description: ARSSS (A Really $H!TTY Side-Scroller) is a hilarious new platformer created by A & D Games for Windows computers. The game takes place in a crappy world full of bad jokes and stinky enemies. The gameplay is like most platformer games, but with custom made music, sound effects, and art work. Download and play for free! Feedback will be much appreciated.

Version History:

V 0.1: First level complete!

V 1.0: Levels 2 and 3 complete, including bug fixes and new game mechanics!

***Brand New! More updates to come!***

*******First itch.io game upload!*******
